desc: My Greens are helping everyday Kiwis to grow fresh, high quality greens at home with the My Greens Hydroponics Garden Towers. Start growing My Greens today!

layout.text: Mum and I love our My Greens system!

It’s so easy to manage and our family of 6 are enjoying eating the fresh produce. It’s so good to know it’s fresh, no bugs or sprays. It’s very easy to grow a few more seedlings when needed to keep up a steady supply. We highly recommend this quality hydroponics system
